Example


AngularJS
Service * $ui.modal
angular .module( "demo.modal", [ "$ui.modal", "$ui.message" ] ) .controller( "modalController", [ "$scope", "$modal", function( $scope, $modal ) { $scope.name = "test"; $scope.open = function( animation ) { return $modal.open( { controller: "modalController", animation: animation, templateUrl: "src/demo/modal/page.html", title: "Mango (Fruit)", class4modal: "demo", scope: $scope } ); }; $scope.showProgress = function() { var modal = $modal.open( { controller: "modalController", templateUrl: "src/demo/modal/page1.html", title: "弹出框标题 18PX 加粗 #333", class4modal: "demo", closeByDocument: true, scope: $scope } ); modal.$node.find( ".md-progress" ).progress().start(); return modal; }; } ] );

The majority of these species are found in nature as wild mangoes. They all belong to the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae. The mango is native to South and Southeast Asia, from where it has been distributed worldwide to become one of the most cultivated fruits in the tropics. </p> <img style="margin: auto; max-width: 100%;" alt="Lush mango tree" src="images/mangues.jpg"> <p style="margin-top: 10px;"> The highest concentration of Mangifera genus is in the western part of Malesia (Sumatra, Java and Borneo) and in Burma and India. While other Mangifera species (e.g. horse mango, M. foetida) are also grown on a more localized basis, Mangifera indica—the "common mango" or "Indian mango"—is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions. </p> <p> It originated in Indian subcontinent (present day India and Pakistan) and Burma. It is the national fruit of India, Pakistan, and the Philippines, and the national tree of Bangladesh. Methods
$modal.open( options ) - 打开弹出框
options - Object

scope - null

指定scope

其他见Options


jQuery
Constructor
$.modal( options )
options - 参数设置
$.modal( { animation: "slide" } );
Options

title - "Modal.JS"

指定title

showTitle - true

显示标题头

mask - true

是否显示遮罩层

render - null

弹出框内容, 字符串或function

draggable - true

true时, 通过标题栏拖拽, 做为字符串时作为选择器定位拖拽元素

class4modal - null

指定弹出框样式

autoShow - true

初始化后打开弹出框, 不通过实例open方法

closeByESC - true

Press Esc close the modal

closeByDocument - true

点击弹出框外面关闭弹出框

animation - "slide"

弹出框动画, slide, stick, bottom, flip, vertical, sign, scale, fadein

onClose - null

弹出框卸载触发

Methods
.open() - Open the modal

.close() - Close the modal
